traits.name: Charge
entries: If the shieldhead moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or fall {@condition prone}.

actions.name: Ram
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3 damage) bludgeoning damage.
